contact.message: Although I'm looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. If you have a question or want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
contact.subtitle: What's Next?

hero.description: I'm a skilled software engineer with a strong problem-solving mindset. I specialize in building innovative solutions for your web development and cloud-based needs.
hero.subheading: I create innovative solutions for your software needs.
hero.title: Adnan Iqbal Khan.

intro.para1: Hello! My name is Hafiz Adnan Iqbal Khan, and I’m a passionate software engineer with over 5 years of experience building innovative web and mobile applications. My programming journey began with a curiosity for creating interactive solutions and solving real-world problems. From developing hybrid mobile applications with React Native to designing scalable backend systems with Express.js and Next.js, I’ve always been driven by a love for clean, efficient code and user-centric designs.
intro.para2: Fast-forward to today, I’ve had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, including AI-based platforms, Salesforce Progressive Web Apps, and cloud-based solutions, while collaborating with startups and established companies like Systems Ltd. I specialize in full-stack development, leveraging technologies like React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS to deliver impactful solutions. Whether it’s integrating third-party APIs, optimizing performance, or deploying scalable applications, I thrive in turning ideas into robust, functional products.

technologies_working_with_recently: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:
